title: DDFP 473: Matt Forte, Chris Harris Jr. & 2016 Bears with 'Big Cat'
itunes:title: DDFP 473: Matt Forte, Chris Harris Jr. & 2016 Bears with 'Big Cat'
description:
Shek is joined by Barstool Sports' Dan "Big Cat" Katz to discuss his move from Chicago to New York, as well as a hypothetical cross-town sports trade between Pittsburgh and Chicago. Shek and Big Cat also determine the best style of hot dog and discuss their personal interactions with J.J. Watt. Plus, the guys review the Bears' 2016 schedule in the latest edition of "On the Record." Later, Jets RB Matt Forte joins Shek to talk about the Jets' quarterback situation and perform his best movie character impersonation. Lastly, Broncos CB Chris Harris Jr. gives his first impression of Paxton Lynch and lists his top WRs in the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
